casebody.data:
Thomas G. GIUCA
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 30, 2017

Douglas H. Butler, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Jennifer F. Miller, deputy assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Thomas G. Giuca's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 171 Conn. App. 619, 157 A.3d 1189 (2017), is denied.
